class PhysicsBody
{
    float Mass { get; set; }
    Vector2 Position { get; set; }
    Vector2 Velocity { get; set; }
    Vector2 TotalForce { get; set; }
    float MaximumVelocity { get; set; }

    // Constructor elided...

    public void OnTick(float elapsedMilliseconds)
    {
        float elapsedSeconds = elapsedMilliseconds / 1000.0f;

        Velocity += elapsedSeconds * (TotalForce / Mass);
        if (Velocity.Length() > MaximumVelocity)
        {
            var direction = Vector2.Normalize(Velocity);
            Velocity = direction * MaximumVelocity;
        }

        Position += elapsedSeconds * Velocity;
    }
}
